CLIENT CHARTER

CLIENT CHARTER
--------------

**DEPARTMENT OF DEPUTY VICE CHANCELLOR (ACADEMIC & INTERNATIONAL)**

*   Provide friendly service to customers accurately and quickly.
*   Formulate and implement University academic policies in line with national and global educational aspirations.
*   Ensure academic quality assurance is complied with based on established standards.
*   Offers a conducive learning environment and infrastructure.
*   To ensure a holistic and balanced academic programme that meets the needs of the industry.
*   Improving the quality of teaching and learning.

PIAGAM PELANGGAN
----------------

**JABATAN TIMBALAN NAIB CANSELOR (AKADEMIK & ANTARABANGSA)**

*   Memberi perkhidmatan yang mesra kepada pelanggan dengan tepat dan cepat.
*   Menggubal dan melaksanakan dasar akademik universiti selaras dengan aspirasi pendidikan nasional dan global.
*   Memastikan jaminan kualiti akademik dipatuhi berdasarkan piawaian yang ditetapkan.
*   Menawarkan persekitaran pembelajaran dan prasarana yang kondusif.
*   Memastikan program akademik yang holistik dan seimbang serta memenuhi keperluan industri.
*   Menambahbaik kualiti pengajaran dan pembelajaran.
